Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2009 02:20PM nancys1 wrote: My experience at MSKCC has been absolutely wonderful. The care is amazing, the hospital is spotless and quiet. My doctors were kind and took their time. I was able to make appointments as necessary and most appts. were prompt. I would not go anywhere else - they are state of the art and know all of the latest research. I want to be cured and they are the best of the best!
Posts.Title: Sloan-Kettering KATIEKAY Hortense
